summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ServisPro Company (Entreprise) features. All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all new features working correctly: Company registration with 2-step form (informations + documents), company login via RCCM number, company dashboard with profile/documents/services/job offers tabs, admin dashboard Entreprises tab with company list, details view, document viewing, and approve/reject/delete functionality.

UI - Company Auth page with login/register tabs

seed_data_creation: Test company 'Test Construction SARL' with RCCM/GC/TEST001 exists in database for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All company (entreprise) features are working correctly. The company registration uses a 2-step form (CompanyAuth.js): Step 1 collects company information (name, RCCM, NIF, sector, region/city, address, phone, email, website, description, contact person, password), Step 2 allows document uploads (logo, licence, RCCM doc, NIF doc, attestation fiscale). Company login uses RCCM number + password. CompanyDashboard.js has 4 tabs: Profil, Documents, Services, Offres Emploi. Pending companies see restriction messages on Services and Jobs tabs. AdminDashboard.js has Entreprises tab showing company list with details panel including document status and approve/reject/delete buttons. API endpoints: /api/auth/company/register, /api/auth/company/login, /api/company/profile/me, /api/company/upload-document/{type}, /api/admin/companies, /api/admin/companies/{id}/approve, /api/admin/companies/{id}/reject.
